title: Week 16 Sunday Recap, Playoff Pictures & Coaches On The Hot Seat (Football 12/24)
description:
Pete Prisco and Nick Kostos recap the Sunday slate of week 16 NFL games including how the playoff pictures are shaping up and what coaches' seats are the warmest. First, Nick and Pete tell you how their picks are shaping up. Then, the duo recap the Sunday games for the NFL's week 16, breaking down the good and the bad. Finally, the guys discuss the AFC & NFC playoff pictures, who's looking most like the league MVP, and who could be fired once the season ends for many teams.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
